warga kilomitar 99,300 k wishala dofar pradeshaya me ratata himiwima gana katha dekak mata ahannata labuna.manda athithaye me bimkada ayathwa thibune yemanayatayi.yemanayen kumariyak me ratata diga denawita ayata thaggak lesa me bima labadun bawa eka kathawaka kiyawena athara yemanayata mudal gewa me palatha miladi gath bawa thawath kathawaka sandahan wenawa.mona aakarayata ayithi wuwath dofar palatha ratata mahathma sampathak bawa nam kiwayuthumayi.mehi ek anthayaka pawathinne yemana desha simawayi.namuth godabimen yemanayata yannata nohaki aakarayata desha simawa kalaka sita wasa dama aththe yemanaye pawathina abhyanthara yuddhaya nisa rate siwil palanaya anathurata lakwi athi hethuwenuyi.

dewiyanwahansege putha්rayanan paga dama, thama pirisidu kala giwisume le ashuddha deyak kota sitha, anuga්rahaye aathmayananta apahasa kala thanaththa eeta wada kopamana mahath danduwamakata sudussek kota gananganu nolabanneda? 30 maknisada paliganima mata ayithiya, mamma pa්rathipala dennemiyi kiyada, swaminwahanse thamange senaga winishchaya karana seka kiyada ki thananwahanse api danimuwa. 31 jiwamanawu dewiyanwahansege athwalata asuwima bhayanaka deyakya. 32 numuth numbaala aaloka karanu labuwata pasu numbaala duk namathi mahath pora badimak isuluwawu palamu dawas sihikarapalla. 33 esewune ninda saha pida karanakota gena parihasa hethuwak karanu labimenuth, ese karanu labuwanta hawulkarayan wimenuthya. 34 maknisada hirakarayanwa sitinnanta numbaala anukampawa dakwuwa pamanak nowa, wada uthumwu pawathinnawu wasthuwak numbaalata athi bawa danagena, numbaalage depala kollakama pa්rithiyen iwasawuwahuya. 35 ebawin, mahath wipakayak aththawu numbaalage nisaka kama athnarilla. 36 maknisada dewiyanwahansege kamaththa kala pasu poronduwa labana pinisa numbaalata iwasilla oonaya. 37 maknisada ennawu thananwahanse pa්ramada nowi, thawa itha swalpa kalayakin enaseka. 38 indin mage dharmishtaya adahillen jiwathwe.
namuth ejapaye naththeth eekamayi.
